short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent mouse wheel scrolling if alt is pressed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This comes in handy if system events are already bound to scrolling with modifier keys like for example the window managers desktop zoom accessibility feature which would otherwise cause page-scrolling in Chrome every time it is being used.
